name: WiredTiger Data File
summary: A WT file is a data file used by the WiredTiger storage engine included with MongoDB database software. It contains a collection of data blocks in the WiredTiger (WT) format, a proprietary format MongoDB uses as tables to make up a database. The first block in a WT file is a WT_BLOCK_DESC block that includes metadata to verify the legitimacy of the data and prevent corruption, followed by blocks storing data that makes up the table.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
